A fun game that allows you to either go on a killing spree as some of your favorite movie killers or as one of the awesome original ones that BH made. Or, you can do what most people stuck in a horror film never do and that is loop a killer around a pallet to slam it on their head then teabag them. You know, the smartest thing to do to the person that is trying to murder you to their spider god.

I realy enjoy this game! Even if there is many bugs, i still enjoy it everytime I open it, the side of having to do some teamwork and strategise with your teamates to win keeps it interesting. And the double thumbs up to the environment artist! 

This game is not for everyone, watching a few streams before deciding to get it would be recommended, and its even better to play with friends trust me ;)

It is very fun to play no matter you are playing this game alone or with your friends. It takes time to practice how to fight against the killers. Overall, it is a very fun game and very player-friendly. But the only thing that I hope they can change is the invitation system. You have to press shift+tab to open the steam window to invite your friends, that's a bit inconvenience.

At over 700 hours in this game no game is ever the same.  Its an awesome jump scare game that will have you on the edge of your seat....and possibly yelling at your screen when people kite the killer to you or blow up the generator you are all working on!  LOL  Its all about fun so don't take your gaming seriously!

Once this was a very fun game, however the refusal of the developers to do something about the toxic behavior of the community has turned the game into a pointless grind of frustration.  For 90% of the matches you will either get matched up with teammates that don't know what they're doing or a killer that will camp or tunnel.  Hopefully they will do something to make it fun again.

Its a good game. But the developers do not care about the player base at all. They refuse to listen and pump out underwhelming content as much as they can. If you want to try the game, its free on Epic until the 9th, if you enjoy it sink time into it but I cannot recommend you spend money on this game until the developers actually care.

Gerçekten pc basında bu kadar eğlenebileceğimi yeri geldiğinde trol yeri geldiğinde sonuna kadar gerilimi hissettiren muazzam bir oyun.Katillerin peşimizde olduğu zamanki çalan gerilim müzikleri (her katile özel) dehşet verici.Herkese kesinlikle tavsiyemdir sonuna kadar öneririim.Başlarda perk sistemi biraz karışık gelir  sonradan alıştınızmı tadından gecemezsiniz.Binbir çeşit strateji katilden kacarken yaptığınız planlar anlatılmaz yaşanır arkadaşlar indirimdeyken hiç kacırılmaması gereken bir oyun.Neyse fazla uzatmadan bir el daha atayım :D 

Edit:Micheal Myers favorimdir.Kurbanlarıma her zaman 1 şans tanırım gacmasına izin verdiğim bile olmuştur.

This game is not for people who are easily annoyed or rage a lot. You will come across bugs, trashy killers, and toxic teammates. However, I really enjoy the game and I recommend it to everyone. The game itself is great, some matches are extremely enjoyable and that is usually the case. You will NOT win every match, and you might be tunnelled, facecamped, or etc. The best thing to do in that case imo is to just move on to the next match. It's fun to play solo, and it's even more fun to play with friends. It's definitely not for everyone, but you should give it a go.
very nais god shity games yes?

Muy buen juego para jugar solo o con amigos donde podes encontrar tanto risas como sustos. Tiene algunos aspectos que faltan pulir como servidores dedicados,mapas mal diseñados o que necesitan rework, hitboxes, etc. Tiene una comunidad toxica pero en mi opinión eso lo hace mejor, porque se triggerean fácil y después te putean en el perfil y te cagas de risa.

8/10
MUITO BOM :V

Fun grinding game. You grind for abilities to change your play style and not for cosmetics. Which these days is a big deal. Dont get me wrong. There are a lot of bugs, especially after each chapter. But BHVR is good about keeping the bugs to a level where the game is playable. But honestly after 600 hours I still love this game and I know there are a lot of people who have played a lot more that will say the same thing
